title: The Peanuts Book: A Visual History of the Iconic Comic Strip
description:
From the backyard to outer space, Charles M. Schulz's 
Peanuts
 has been charming the world for more than 70 years.In this celebration of Schulz and his beloved work, explore rarely seen sketches, influential comic strips, and collectors' artifacts. Pore over evolving artworks of Snoopy, Charlie Brown, and the gang. Chart the rich history of Peanuts as it grew to become the world's favorite comic, and travel from 1950 to the present day, from California to Japan. Every page of this visual guide is an exhibition to treasure. Discover the enduring and nostalgic charm of Peanuts in this stunning anniversary book.With a foreword by Stephen Colbert.(c) 2020 Peanuts Worldwide LLC
author: Simon Beecroft
